messages.text: I'm a full-time student at the University of Technology, Sydney studying a combined Bachelor of Business, Bachelor of Computing.
I'm majoring in Marketing (for the Business) and Programming (for the Computing).
You probably could've guessed the programming part üòú
I've recently turned 21 and have completed two and half years of my four year degree.
I'm born and raised in the Eastern Suburbs of Sydney, Australia.
Ah yeah lots of hobbies! A few too many really hahaha
